article_title: The 'Cadillac' Tax Shows Why Obamacare Was Never Built To Last

article_metadata.author: Tax Analysts

og.description: The “Cadillac” tax – Obamacare’s signature albatross – was never a good idea. Sure, it was good policy, as more than 100 economists pointed out last week. But it was always bad politics. And when it comes to building durable social programs, politics matter.
